# recordTypes

**Instance Property**

The type of records that this query returns.

## Declaration

```swift
var recordTypes: [String] { get }
```

## Discussion

For a list of the most common record types, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKVerifiableClinicalRecordCredentialType].

## Accessing the Metadata

- **sourceTypes**: The format of the verifiable clinical record.
